```r
adult %>%
  filter(rel.abundance != 0) %>%
  count(OTU) %>%
  slice_max(n,
            n = 10) -> adultmostprev

adult %>%
  dplyr::select(OTU,kingdom,phylum,class,order,family,genus) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  filter(genus != \Pseudoalteromonas\") %>%
